sentences.en: Andrew began to carve the chicken.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁开始切鸡肉。

sentences.en: Ask the man in the shop to carve the meat up for you.
sentences.cn: 请商店里的那个人帮你把肉切成碎块.

sentences.en: At the dinnertable, father's job is to carve the meat.
sentences.cn: 吃饭时, 爸爸的工作是切肉.

sentences.en: Carve the beef into slices.
sentences.cn: 把牛肉切成片。

sentences.en: Carve the fowl into 8 pieces.
sentences.cn: 把这只家禽切成8块。

sentences.en: Carve the meat into slices.
sentences.cn: 把肉切成片。

sentences.en: Carve the names and gild them.
sentences.cn: 把姓名刻上去，再镀上金。

sentences.en: carved wooden chairs
sentences.cn: 木雕椅子

sentences.en: carving out a 5 per cent share of the overall vote.
sentences.cn: 在所有选票中分得５％的份额。

sentences.en: From their flexible and unformed minds I can carve out my fittest tools.
sentences.cn: 我可以把他们易变的、不成熟的心灵雕塑成最适合我的工具.

sentences.en: he managed to carve out a successful photographic career for himself.
sentences.cn: 他终于为自己开辟了成功的摄影事业。

sentences.en: He wanted to go into the street and carve someone's face up.
sentences.cn: 他想上街去把别人的脸刮花。

sentences.en: Sure, it was aggravating, but that's no reason to carve her up.
sentences.cn: 当然, 这会激怒别人, 但也没理由把她切成碎片.

sentences.en: The dark days when imperialism could carve up the world at will are gone for ever.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义可以任意瓜分世界的黑暗时代一去不复返了.

sentences.en: The girl from nowhere clearly means to carve herself a place in history.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，这个名不见经传的女孩想留名青史。

sentences.en: The new superconductors look set to carve themselves a useful niche in the world's electrical industries.
sentences.cn: 这种新的超导体看起来很有可能在世界电气工业中占得能够发挥作用的一隅。

sentences.en: We carve and paint and we enjoy what is carved and painted.
sentences.cn: 我们从事雕刻和绘画,我们也欣赏雕刻和绘画作品.

sentences.en: West Africa was carved up by the Europeans.
sentences.cn: 西非曾被欧洲人瓜分。

sentences.en: Why would he carve himself up if he were still ClA?
sentences.cn: 如果他还是中情局干员为什么自己动手术?

sentences.en: With a kitchen knife in his hand, Antonio began to cut and carve this butter.
sentences.cn: 安东尼奥手持菜刀, 开始雕刻这块黄油.

words.tran_cn: 切肉刀；雕刻者；切肉的人
雕刻（carve的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.phrase: be carved on tablets of stone
carve someone up informal 非正式

trans.tran_cn: 雕刻，切下（肉片） ，开创（事业），铺（路）
trans.tran_en: to make an object or pattern by cutting a piece of wood or stone

trans.tran_cn: 切， 把…切碎； 雕刻， 刻
trans.tran_en: to make an object or pattern by cutting a piece of wood or stone
to make an object or pattern by cutting a piece of wood or stone
